Name: Protect Me Knight
Overview:
Protect Me Knight is a retro style action tower defense game developed by Ancient for the Xbox 360â€™s Xbox Live Indie Games service. 

Players assume the roles of four character classes (Fighter, Ninja, Amazon, or Mage) tasked with protecting the Princess from legions of monsters. Players must attack the monsters directly to wipe them out but can also construct barriers around the Princess to protect her.  Protect Me Knight features 8-bit visuals and music composed by Ancient co-founder Yuzo Koshiro.
